markdown:
<title level="1" right="Spell 10" pfs="Limited">[Nullify](/Spells.aspx?ID=958)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Abjuration" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=2" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Secrets of Magic](/Sources.aspx?ID=96) pg. 118 <sup>1.1</sup></row>

**Traditions**
[Arcane](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=1), [Divine](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=2), [Occult](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=3), [Primal](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=4)

**Spell Lists**
[Elemental](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=5)

<row gap="medium">

<row gap="tiny">
<row>**Cast**</row>
<row><actions string="Reaction" /></row>
<row>[somatic](/Rules.aspx?ID=283), [verbal](/Rules.aspx?ID=284)</row>
</row>

**Trigger** a foe within range casts a 9th-level or lower spell

</row>

<row gap="medium">
**Range** 120 feet

**Target** the triggering spell
</row>

<row gap="medium">

</row>

</column>

---

You instantly destroy the incoming spell, though at the cost of sending magical feedback through your body. You automatically [counteract](/Rules.aspx?ID=371) the spell, but the feedback brings you unavoidable harm. You lose 1d8 Hit Points per level of the triggering spell.
name: Nullify

<traits>

</traits>

<additional-info>
<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Secrets of Magic](/Sources.aspx?ID=96) pg. 118 <sup>1.1</sup></row>

[Arcane](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=1), [Divine](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=2), [Occult](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=3), [Primal](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=4)

</row>

<row gap="medium">
 

 
</row>

---

<summary>
React to automatically counteract a spell and take backlash damage.
</summary>
summary: React to automatically counteract a spell and take backlash damage.

text: Nullify Source Secrets of Magic pg. 118 1.1 Traditions Arcane, Divine, Occult, Primal Spell Lists Elemental Cast Reaction somatic, verbal Trigger a foe within range casts a 9th-level or lower spell Range 120 feet Target the triggering spell --- You instantly destroy the incoming spell, though at the cost of sending magical feedback through your body. You automatically counteract the spell, but the feedback brings you unavoidable harm. You lose 1d8 Hit Points per level of the triggering spell.
